title: The Mortal One
description: A simple life. It's all Dylan ever wanted. But she was left at the altar, hated her job, and had a sneaking suspicion that vampires existed. She goes on a European vacation to find herself and ends up coming face to face with a vampire - an Italian one named Nico. He's willing to protect her, but there's another vampire who wants to stake his claim.Before Dylan can even process it all, she's involved in an exhilarating love affair with the undead and dealing with vampire politics that prove to be quite complicated.This is book one of the international bestselling series.
